WorkPlace.Name: Adecco
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Master Data Specialist to Siemens Gamesa
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have good experience with SAP – and are you open to improve and develop new business processes fitting to the SAP landscape? Then you might the right candidate for this position.

For Siemens Gamesa in Brande, we are looking for a Master Data Specialist. It is a long-term contract, and the start date is as soon as possible.

About the position

  • You will be a user of SAP and need to be open to improve and develop new business processes fitting to the SAP landscape
  • You have knowledge about SAP RBP Master Data, preferrable about the material master and rental setup
  • You follow organizational procedures to conform to productive work
  • You execute the work packages within required time, budget, quality
  • You actively contribute to cooperation with all others involved and with interface partners and passing on all relevant information to keep themselves and others informed and create an optimum in the communication chain
  • You respond to operations related enquiries, may act as first point of contact in subject matters
  • You liaise with functionally involved Operations and Professionals
  • You provide input to management and prepare analyses to the team lead

​What you need to make a difference

Passion for renewable energy and a sense for the importance to lead the change. We are also looking for…

  • Strong coordinator across functions and departments​; self-driven and persistent while also being open and communicative with a structured mind set
  • wish to be a part of a team where we work together and support each other
  • working effectively with others with limited supervision and willingness to learn
  • You enjoy working with details but can also see the bigger picture
  • Background in SAP related work environment is required. A profile which as a track record of 5+ years of successful experience in a directly related field. Ideally you have work experience from a comparable business.
  • Good technical insight on master data set up and order management processes, both standard tools and more complex processes are required
  • Advanced in SAP
  • Fluent in English
  • Basic IT skills (Power Point, Word, Excel, Outlook)​

Application

You will be hired through Adecco, and it is also Adecco who take care of the recruitmentprocess. We are reviewing applications on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, do not wait to forward your resume and application.

If you have any questions you are welcome to contact Recruitment Consultant, Amalie Christensen at 3838 1134.

We look forward hearing from you.
